name: Pick Bonus Mini Game
description:
This is not a full fledged game but more of a small implementation of an idea.

Pick Bonus in casino games are mini games that are used to determine the amount someone can make on a bonus round. This example was made in Unity 2020.3.11f1 and is in 2D and makes use of the Unity2D lighting system. 2D art was made in photoshop. 

Music OST is 

Historical Sketch No. 1

 https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/471813

For more information on Pick Bonuses in Casino Games, Check this out
